languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).
languages.original_text: Когда охотник убивает цель, помеченную как добыча, он получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} до конца боя. Бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранга{/g} добычи (римская цифра на иконке противника).

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} ein Ziel als Beute markiert, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Dieser Bonus richtet sich nach der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Feindes (der römischen Zahl auf dem Symbol des Feindes).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Jäger als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markiert, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen addierbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Dieser Bonus richtet sich nach der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Feindes (der römischen Zahl auf dem Symbol des Feindes).

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} tue une cible désignée comme proie, il bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulable jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus dépend du {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi (représenté par le chiffre romain sur son icône).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Chasseur tue une cible désignée comme une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}, il bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulable jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus dépend du {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi (représenté par le chiffre romain sur l'icône de celui-ci).

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}杀死一名猎物时，都可以获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。加成效果取决于敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}（即敌人图标上的罗马数字）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}杀死一名猎物时，都可以获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。加成效果取决于敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}（即敌人图标上的罗马数字）。

languages.original_text: Whenever the Hunter kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mata a un objetivo marcado como presa, obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulable hasta el final del combate. La bonificación depende del {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo (el número romano en el icono del enemigo).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

traits.locale_text: Cuando el cazador mata a un objetivo marcado como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulable hasta el final del combate. La bonificación depende del {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo (el número romano en el icono del enemigo).

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} убивает цель, помеченную как добыча, он получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} до конца боя. Бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранга{/g} добычи (римская цифра на иконке противника).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

traits.locale_text: Убивая добычу, охотник получает суммирующийся бонус, который сохраняется до конца боя. Бонус зависит от ранга противника (он показан римской цифрой на иконке врага).
Убивая добычу, охотник получает суммирующийся бонус, который сохраняется до конца боя. Бонус зависит от ранга противника (он показан римской цифрой на иконке врага).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が獲物としてマークしたターゲットを倒すごとに、戦闘終了まで累積{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。このボーナスは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}（敵アイコンに表示される数字）に応じる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).

traits.locale_text: ハンターが{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}としてマークしたターゲットを倒すごとに、戦闘終了まで累積{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。このボーナスは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}（敵アイコンに表示される数字）に応じる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}; her av olarak işaretlenmiş hedefi öldürdüğünde, çatışma sonuna dek kalan ve üst üste birikebilen bir {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır. Kazanılacak bonus, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesine{/g} (düşmanın simgesi üzerindeki Roma rakamı) bağlı olarak değişiklik gösterir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills a target marked as prey, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon).
